<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Populate the Section Map from COFF section headers.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A Section Map seem to be a copy of a COFF section list in other format.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// I don&#39;t know why a PDB file contains both a COFF section header and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a Section Map, but it seems it must be present in a PDB.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/dbistreambuilder/#a0af5d507fc700e7925e19c7e2911be9b"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/dbistreambuilder/#a0af5d507fc700e7925e19c7e2911be9b">DbiStreamBuilder::createSectionMap</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;llvm::object::coff&#95;section&gt;</a> SecHdrs) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Idx = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aac36edd0f1ce976f0025c98e88d3830eaec211f7c20af43e742bf2570c3cb84f9">Add</a> = &#91;&amp;&#93;() -&gt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pdb/secmapentry">SecMapEntry</a> &amp; &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal">    SectionMap.emplace&#95;back();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Entry = SectionMap.back();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal">    memset(&amp;Entry, 0, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(Entry));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="normal">    Entry.Frame = Idx + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We don&#39;t know the meaning of these fields yet.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
